Title: Pancakes: Chocolate Protein
Instructions: Combine everything in the blender except for oil and chocolate chips. Blend until smooth.
Heat skillet over medium high heat and add the oil, allowing it to melt.
Pour approx. 1/4 cup of the batter onto the hot griddle and cook for 2-3 minutes or until golden on bottom side.
Sprinkle a few chocolate chips over the top before flipping.
Carefully flip and cook other side until golden. Repeat with remaining batter.
To serve, top with chocolate morsels and pure maple syrup.
